name: 60 Second Bonk
description:
This is my submission for the 5th One Minute Game Jam.

In "60 Second Bonk", your task is to run around and bonk as many of the correct colour person as possible within a minute, trying to beat your previous score each time you play!

In this project I was the programmer and had two other artists  working with me, so credit to both Cailean Shaw, and Luke Bembridge for the art 

The music used is also made by Luke Bembridge, you can find it here: 

https://katurclysm.bandcamp.com/album/seek-to-vivify

Other misc. sounds we sourced from fresounds.org
